Uses of Interface
org.apache.tamaya.spi.ClassloaderAware

  • Packages that use ClassloaderAware 
    Package Description
    org.apache.tamaya.core.internal
    Contains implementations of different property sources for supporting CLI, Environment and System Properties as well as simple properties based on the formats defined by Properties.
    org.apache.tamaya.spi
    This package contains the Apache Tamaya SPI artifacts.
    org.apache.tamaya.spisupport  
    org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.propertysource
    Contains internal implementations artifacts registered as services.

    • Uses of ClassloaderAware in org.apache.tamaya.core.internal

      Classes in org.apache.tamaya.core.internal that implement ClassloaderAware 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  OSGIServiceContext
      ServiceContext implementation based on OSGI Service mechanisms.

    • Uses of ClassloaderAware in org.apache.tamaya.spi

      Subinterfaces of ClassloaderAware in org.apache.tamaya.spi 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ServiceContext
      This class models the component that is managing the lifecycle current the services used by the Configuration API.

    • Uses of ClassloaderAware in org.apache.tamaya.spisupport

      Classes in org.apache.tamaya.spisupport that implement ClassloaderAware 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DefaultServiceContext
      This class implements the (default) ServiceContext interface and hereby uses the JDK ServiceLoader to load the services required.

    • Uses of ClassloaderAware in org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.propertysource

      Classes in org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.propertysource that implement ClassloaderAware 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JavaConfigurationPropertySource
      Provider which reads all "META-INF/javaconfiguration.properties" and "META-INF/javaconfiguration.xml" files found in the classpath.
